description: Kubernetes cluster monitoring and orchestration intelligence tool. Monitors pod health, container image vulnerabilities, resource utilization, and provides cluster diagnostics.
explanation: Essential for CTOs managing containerized infrastructure. Provides real-time visibility into pod status, security risks in container images, resource constraints, and cluster health.
semanticDescription: Monitor and analyze Kubernetes cluster health, container security vulnerabilities, and resource allocation across pods and nodes.
usageExamples: Get status of all pods in production namespace
Analyze resource utilization and identify constraint issues
Find pods at risk of termination due to resource limits
inputGuidance: Inputs must include 'action'. Cluster access parameters are optional and use defaults.

inputDefinitions.name: namespace
inputDefinitions.description: Kubernetes namespace to query. Defaults to 'default'.

inputDefinitions.name: pod_name
inputDefinitions.description: Specific pod name to query. Used with pod-specific actions.

inputDefinitions.name: image
inputDefinitions.description: Container image URI to scan for vulnerabilities. Format: registry/image:tag

inputDefinitions.name: cluster_name
inputDefinitions.description: Name of the Kubernetes cluster. Defaults to 'default-cluster'.

inputDefinitions.name: kubeconfig_path
inputDefinitions.description: Path to kubeconfig file for cluster access. Defaults to ~/.kube/config

inputDefinitions.name: severity_threshold
inputDefinitions.description: Minimum vulnerability severity to report: low, medium, high, critical. Defaults to 'high'.

inputDefinitions.name: resource_threshold_percent
inputDefinitions.description: Percentage threshold for resource alerts (0-100). Defaults to 80.

outputDefinitions.name: pod_status_report
outputDefinitions.description: Detailed status of pods including phase, conditions, and resource usage

outputDefinitions.name: vulnerability_report
outputDefinitions.description: Container image vulnerability scan results with severity levels and remediation guidance

outputDefinitions.name: resource_utilization
outputDefinitions.description: Resource usage across cluster, namespace, or specific pod

outputDefinitions.name: cluster_health
outputDefinitions.description: Overall cluster health metrics including node status, etcd health, and API server status

outputDefinitions.name: at_risk_pods
outputDefinitions.description: List of pods at risk due to resource constraints or pending states

outputDefinitions.name: namespace_summary
outputDefinitions.description: Aggregated metrics for a namespace including pod count, resource allocation, and health status
